title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 272-3.2 - Availability of small quanitities of fresh fruits and vegetables
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 272-3.2 - Availability of small quanitities of fresh fruits and vegetables

State Regulations

When varieties or grades of fresh fruits or vegetables
are not available in unpackaged form and the same are being offered for sale at
retail in packaged form, upon customer request a package of fresh fruit or
vegetables of the same variety and grade being offered shall be opened to
provide any small quantity of fresh fruits or vegetables which the customer
desires. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
§§
272-3.2

New

York State Register December 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 51, eff. 12/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
